remarks: Rule to change the bound variable in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvrab.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
cbvrab.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
cbvrab.3 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvrab.4 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvrab.5 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrab $p |- { x e. A | ph } = { y e. A | ps } $.
